body:
Hi Anthony, I have a change to expose it in the works. It trickled down
into some other changes so hopefully in a week or two. I'll keep you
posted!

On Mon, Mar 27, 2017, 19:51 Anthony Platanios <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> @suharshs <https://github.com/suharshs> Is there any estimate on when the
> C++ gradient calculation will be exposed via the C API?
